metadata.title: CVE-2021-29648 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.11.11. The BPFsubsystem does not properly consider that resolved_ids and resolved_sizesare intentionally uninitialized in the vmlinux BPF Type Format (BTF), whichcan cause a system crash upon an unexpected access attempt (in map_createin kernel/bpf/syscall.c or check_btf_info in kernel/bpf/verifier.c), akaCID-350a5c4dd245.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
